r-script.source: library(lattice) source('module1.R') enc <- read.delim(file="temp_encounters.txt") df <- data.frame(Param="Sex", table(enc$sex)) # TODO more counts # write data table write.table(x=df, file="counts.txt", row.names=FALSE, eol="\r\n", sep="\t", fileEncoding="UTF-8"); graph <- histogram(enc$age,xlab="Alter [Jahre]",ylab="Anzahl Patienten",type='count',breaks=seq(0,110,length=12),sub=paste('n =',length(df$age),', Werte größer 110 werden als 110 gewertet')) report.svg(graph,'age');
r-script.resource: # write svg graphics gfx.ext <- '.svg' gfx.dev <- 'svg' report.svg <- function(graph, name, width=8, height=4){ trellis.device(gfx.dev,file=paste0(name,gfx.ext), width=width,height=height) print(graph) no_output <- dev.off() #silent }
